solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public static int hammingWeight(int n) {--newline--        int ones = 0;--newline--            while(n!=0) {--newline--                ones = ones + (n & 1);--newline--                n = n>>>1;--newline--            }--newline--            return ones;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
